channel.title: Elite PVP 24/7 Minecraft Faction Raid Server
channel.description: Elite PVP is a brand new server with two owners, factions, mobcatcher, autosouping, and many more awesome features! We will be adding more things for sure and would love to see you there! The server is in Early Alpha so report and bugs or other problems to elitepvphelp@gmail.com. We hope to see you on the server! :) Come Check Us Out At ElitePVP.beastnode.net. Our Website is elite-pvp-mc.enjin.com at which you can donate and post on the forums.
